flawed_nl_solution:
3000 new bees are born every day. In 7 days there will be 3000*7=<<3000*7=210000>>210000 new bees
If each day the queen loses 900 bees, in 7 days there will be 900*7=<<900*7=6300>>6300 fewer bees
If at the beginning the queen had 12500 bees, then at the end of 7 days she will have 12500+210000-6300=<<12500+210000-6300=216200>>216200 bees
The total number of bees in the hive including the queen is 216200+1 =<<216200+1=216201>>216201
#### 216201

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21000, not 210000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
